Package edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.user

Class User

java.lang.Object
edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.user.User
Direct Known Subclasses:
Faculty, Student
public abstract class User
extends java.lang.Object
An abstract class representing a user in the PackScheduler system. Includes all getters and setters for any inherited User classes.
Author:
Daniel Nolting, Kelsey Hanser, Nick Bluzen

    • User

      public User​(java.lang.String firstName, java.lang.String lastName, java.lang.String id, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String hashPW)
      Generates a User using all fields
      Parameters:
      firstName - the first name of the user
      lastName - the last name of the user
      id - the id of the user
      email - the email of the user
      hashPW - the hashed password of the user

    • setEmail

      public void setEmail​(java.lang.String email)
      Sets the student's email, throwing an IllegalArgumentException if the provided email is null, an empty string, does not contain "@" or ".", or the index of the last "." is earlier than the index of the first "@"
      Parameters:
      email - the email to set
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the email is invalid

    • getPassword
